Alert Name: bush
Al Qaeda video taunts Bush, Iran, Shiites

05/05/07 07:50 PM, EDT
A new video from al Qaeda No. 2 man Ayman al-Zawahiri addresses the issue of setting a timetable for withdrawal of troops from Iraq.
